title: A  INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES
description: Introduces Apple's Services and basic usage requirements.

title: B  USING OUR SERVICES
description: Overview of using Apple’s Services, with guidelines and responsibilities.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES AND REFUNDS
description: Discusses payment methods, taxes, refunds, and general transaction policies.

title: ACCOUNT
description: Covers required account usage, responsibilities, and user age requirements.

title: PRIVACY
description: Addresses how user data is handled according to Apple's Privacy Policy.

title: SERVICES AND CONTENT USAGE RULES
description: Defines permissible ways to use the Services and Content, including device and usage limitations.

title: DOWNLOADS
description: Explains rules and limitations regarding downloading content.

title: SUBSCRIPTIONS
description: Details recurring subscriptions, billing, and cancellations.

title: CONTENT AND SERVICE AVAILABILITY
description: Describes the availability of certain content and services across different regions.

title: THIRD-PARTY DEVICES AND EQUIPMENT
description: Covers usage limitations when using the Services on non-Apple-branded devices or equipment.

title: C  YOUR SUBMISSIONS TO OUR SERVICES
description: Outlines guidelines for submitting or posting user-generated materials within Apple's Services.

title: D  FAMILY SHARING
description: Explains the Family Sharing feature, including shared purchases and Ask to Buy.

title: E  SERIES PASS AND MULTI-PASS
description: Covers purchasing and receiving television content with series or multi-pass options.

title: F  ADDITIONAL APP STORE TERMS (EXCLUDING APPLE ARCADE APPS)
description: Provides additional licensing and usage rules for Apps in the App Store, excluding Apple Arcade Apps.

title: G  ADDITIONAL TERMS FOR CONTENT ACQUIRED FROM THIRD PARTIES
description: Addresses content obtained from third-party providers and Apple’s role as an agent.

title: H  ADDITIONAL APPLE MUSIC TERMS
description: Describes additional terms specifically related to Apple Music and iCloud Music Library.

title: I  ADDITIONAL APPLE FITNESS+ TERMS
description: Explains disclaimers for the Apple Fitness+ service regarding medical advice.

title: J  CARRIER MEMBERSHIP
description: Covers the terms for purchasing a Service membership through a wireless carrier.

title: K  MISCELLANEOUS TERMS APPLICABLE TO ALL SERVICES
description: Includes various additional terms such as definitions, contract changes, third-party materials, intellectual property, and copyright info.

title: TERMINATION AND SUSPENSION OF SERVICES
description: Sets out conditions under which Apple may terminate or suspend services for breach or other reasons.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
description: Describes disclaimers of warranties and liability limitations, including the scope of Apple's responsibilities and the responsibilities of users in case of service interruptions or security intrusions.

title: STATUTORY EXCEPTIONS FOR PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS
description: Sets out exceptions for qualified public educational or government institutions, detailing how certain sections may be deemed invalid or unenforceable, and how those terms should be construed under governing law.

title: GOVERNING LAW
description: Specifies the legal jurisdiction applicable to the agreement, including the forum for resolving disputes and the laws that govern the agreement.

title: OTHER PROVISIONS
description: Outlines additional terms, including entire agreement provisions, exceptions for unenforceable terms, notice methods, and Apple’s rights regarding compliance enforcement.
